name: Even Cleaner FriendFeed
description: Additional improvements over AJ Batac's "Cleaner FriendFeed" style.
additional_info:
Changes:

- made user statistics (subscribers, comments, likes) smaller
- forced title text in sidebar boxes to be white (NOTE: breaks the Helvetica theme)
- removed FF logo override
- fixed some hover anomalies images that are also links
- added a hover border around images
- removed background color from comments by people you already sub
- added gray background to comments by people you are not subscribed to
- font readability improvements
- removed a lot of unnecessary whitespace
- prettied up the "Likes" area
- standardized the look of most links
